seo.title: Garmin Edge® 130 Plus | Bike GPS Computer
seo.ogDescription: The Edge® 130 is a compact easy-to-use GPS bike computer that has everything you need to navigate your ride, monitor stats, and stay connected with loved ones.

overviewTab.title: Overview

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
Standard (Device Only)

  • Edge® 130 Plus
  • Standard Mount
  • USB cable

Bundle

  • HRM-Dual™
  • Standard Mount
  • USB cable
  • Tether
  • Manuals

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
General
Dimension41 x 63 x 16 mm
Weight33 g
Water rating IPX7
Display TypeMonochrome, transflective memory-in-pixel (MIP)
Display Size1.8" (45.0 mm) diagonal
Display Resolution303 x 230 pixels
Battery typeRechargeable lithium-ion
Battery life12 hours

Maps & Memory
External memory storageInternal memory only
Waypoints/favorites/locations100 locations
Navigation Routes30 courses
History100 hours

Sensors
GPS
GLONASS
Galileo
Barometric altimeter
Accelerometer

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth®, ANT+®
Connect IQ™ (downloadable watch faces, data fields, widgets and apps)yes (data fields only)
Smart Notificationsyes (calls and texts only)
Weather forecasts
Smart trainer control
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Safety and Tracking Features
Assistance
LiveTrack
Incident Detection
Weather alerts

Activity Tracking Features
Calories Burned

Training, Planning and Analysis Features
Customisable screen(s)
Downloadable training plans
Auto Pause®
Advanced workouts
Auto Lap®
Vo2 Max
Recovery advisor
Virtual Partner
Race an Activity
Segments
Auto scroll
Physio TrueUp

Cycling Features
Courses
Alerts (triggers alarm when you reach goals including time, distance, heart rate or calories)
MTB Dynamics
Compatible with Varia™ radar (rear-facing radar)
Compatible with Varia Radar Camera
Compatible with Varia™ lights
Power meter compatible

Connectivity
Edge® remote
